MUX ranges from a HUD interface rework, to add-ons with extra features, and additionally frameworks adding additional functionality in an easy to access way.
State.Name: M.U.X. Series - Interface Overhaul

State.Author: S6S
State.Description: The Sweet 6 Shooter perk pack adds 99 perks and 22 traits in a vanilla friendly, immersive way.
